short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support Plenty independent bookshop by shopping Bookshop.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As you browse books on a popular shopping site named after a rainforest, this extension searches for the same book on Bookshop.org and, if found, offers a link to the independent option.

Discover great books and make a difference with just one clickâ€”no extra searching required! Enjoy the convenience of online browsing while promoting independent, community-driven bookshops!
